Class TabItem<S extends java.util.function.Supplier<T>,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.tabgui.TabItem<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the item state supplier type
    T - the item state type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tab, TabGUI

    public abstract class TabItem<S extends java.util.function.Supplier<T>,T>
extends ComponentBase
    Class representing a tab in the TabGUI.
